casebody.data:
Howard KETCHAM, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. NEW YORK WORLD’S FAIR 1939, Inc., Defendant-Appellee. No. 274. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit May 5, 1941. Morgan, Finnegan & Durham, of New York City (George B. Finnegan, Jr., of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Lord, Day & Lord, of New York City (Woodson-D. Scott, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before SWAN, CHASE, and CLARK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree, 34 F.Supp. 657, affirmed.
